mapper.select: select t.id as tweetId,t.title,t.content,t.user_id as tweetUserId,u.user_name as tweetUserName from tweet t left join `user` u on u.id=t.user_id where t.id =#{tweetId} and t.status_flag=1 and u.status_flag=1
mapper.update: update tweet set title = #{title},content=#{content} where id =#{id} and user_id =#{userId}
update tweet set status_flag=0 where id =#{tweetId} and user_id =#{userId}
